item.title: Comment on The Barefoot Lawyer Breaks Down by craignmoore
item.dc:creator: craignmoore
item.description:
Hi Noah--
I received word of your post via LinkedIn and was very happy about it. I also have to say that your video both touched and moved me very much. And I could not have agreed more with the sentiments you expressed. I hope you and your family are enjoying a glorious New England summer. Truth be told, I am more than a little jealous (though I do not begrudge you one moment of joy). My time will come soon enough. What am I saying? My time is virtually here--this retirement gig is great. But, when Anne-Marie has finished in Super Court, I expect we too shall. be heading northward. Homeward bound. Until then or whenever, stay safe. All the best, Craig
item.content:encoded:
Hi Noah–

I received word of your post via LinkedIn and was very happy about it. I also have to say that your video both touched and moved me very much. And I could not have agreed more with the sentiments you expressed. I hope you and your family are enjoying a glorious New England summer. Truth be told, I am more than a little jealous (though I do not begrudge you one moment of joy). My time will come soon enough. What am I saying? My time is virtually here–this retirement gig is great. But, when Anne-Marie has finished in Super Court, I expect we too shall. be heading northward. Homeward bound. Until then or whenever, stay safe. All the best, Craig

item.title: Comment on Productivity by Noah Clements
item.dc:creator: Noah Clements
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2019/05/21/productivity/#comment-14986">Scrofano Law PC</a>.
I agree. I often have to psyche myself into it though by listing the things I just did. Deal with big deal emergency - Check!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Scrofano Law PC.

I agree. I often have to psyche myself into it though by listing the things I just did. Deal with big deal emergency – Check!

item.title: Comment on Productivity by Scrofano Law PC
item.dc:creator: Scrofano Law PC
item.description: Great post! I find to do lists can be very helpful in running my criminal law practice. Sometimes checking off small tasks help me build momentum into feeling productive and getting more done.
item.content:encoded: Great post! I find to do lists can be very helpful in running my criminal law practice. Sometimes checking off small tasks help me build momentum into feeling productive and getting more done.

item.title: Comment on Just keep swimming by Tom O
item.dc:creator: Tom O
item.description: Thank you for this beautiful post, and thank you for your strong and loving support of so many, especially Denise. Happy Mother's Day! Tom O
item.content:encoded: Thank you for this beautiful post, and thank you for your strong and loving support of so many, especially Denise. Happy Mother’s Day! Tom O

item.title: Comment on Juxtapose by Stephanie S Mackey
item.dc:creator: Stephanie S Mackey
item.description: This is very beautifully written, I had such a hard time during mass on Sunday as feelings or worry, sadness, stress and anger became overwhelming during the opening song, “Why have you abandoned me?” It warms my heart to read your reflection and remember we have to have moments of pain so we appreciate the joy. It reminds me of flying to NYC and picking you and sweet baby Wiley up for Uncle Jim’s funeral, and the risk and fear of that rental car with bad brakes all the way to G’ville. So worth all of it for the feeling of home. XO!
item.content:encoded: This is very beautifully written, I had such a hard time during mass on Sunday as feelings or worry, sadness, stress and anger became overwhelming during the opening song, “Why have you abandoned me?” It warms my heart to read your reflection and remember we have to have moments of pain so we appreciate the joy. It reminds me of flying to NYC and picking you and sweet baby Wiley up for Uncle Jim’s funeral, and the risk and fear of that rental car with bad brakes all the way to G’ville. So worth all of it for the feeling of home. XO!

item.title: Comment on Beach Walk 8 – ShowUp by Christina
item.dc:creator: Christina
item.description:
Noah, you are a fine lawyer because you are a great man. I was so touched by your article about your family. With qualities like you have, success will follow. Be well, my friend.
Christina
item.content:encoded:
Noah, you are a fine lawyer because you are a great man. I was so touched by your article about your family. With qualities like you have, success will follow. Be well, my friend.

Christina
